description.details: Professional validator service. Providing IBC for Evmos. Active participant in Evmos governance. Low fees.

contributions.name: Genesis validator
contributions.description: We were selected by team as genesis validator because of our skills.

contributions.name: Testnets participant
contributions.description: We have been participating in Evmos since 'Arsia mons' testnet. Running current 'evmos_9000-4' testnet

contributions.name: IBC
contributions.description: Maintaining Evmos IBC channels to Gravity Bridge, Terra2, Crescent

contributions.name: Governance
contributions.description: We are interested in Evmos chain development and governance. That's why we are actively participating in discussions at commonwealth. Our voting ratio is 100%. Almost always we attend Council meetings

contributions.name: IBC docs
contributions.description: Helped to create doc with all active IBC channels

infrastructures.stack_details: We are using sentry nodes and firewall to mitigate DDOS attacks on validator's node. Using tKMS to secure our validator's keys. Our main infra is deployed in OVH, our backup infra is Hetzner. We using grafana, discord and telegram bots as alerts system.
